reviews.review:
This game is awesome.
The story is awesome and picked up perfectly after the first game.
The gameplay feels a bit different from Portal 1 but is still (like everything else in the game) great.
The graphics also changed a bit, but still look gorgeous.
Co-op is a good way to play with friends.
And with the Perpetual Testing Initiative, the game has pretty much no end!

Long story short: A must-have on any decent PC. (Though I advise to wait for a sale.)

In my opinion this game is perfect, and I don't use superlatives lightly.
The humor is brilliant, the puzzles complex but clever, the voice acting on point.
I literally cannot find any faults, except maybe the loading, there are a lot of loading screens. But hey, if I'm so impatient to get into the next level, isn't that a good thing?
Oh and btw, the graphics are about slightly better than average now, but for their time, they were amazing.

This game takes portal and brings it to a new level. I think this game is better than portal 1, and the Co-op is neat. It is also nice to have community made content plus the level editor. Best puzzle game ever! The story is amazing, the soundtrack is awesome, but the puzzles are quite easy until you get to the final chapter. The co-op is also great, it's great with friends, but the co-op puzzles are hard from the start. There is also a puzzle editor (wich I've never tried), so you can create some puzzles and upload them to Steam Workshop. You can of courss download and play puzzles from Workshop and there are also puzzles for co-op. You can get some items for the co-op (I think you can get a hat and a flag, that's all), but other items, such as skins or hats, can no longer be obtained since the in-game shop doesn't work (at least for me).

i like the robot

a great sequel. adds more levels, story, better graphic quality and adds new things to the portal universe. i played the sequel before the first portal. i didn't know some of the story that happened before the events of portal 2 but that didn't ruin my experiance at all (i'm soory if any of you got angry i playe the sequel first). the story is explored deeply while not getting in the way of the gameplay. adds a lot of character development to Glados (No Spoilers) that will be surprising. great experiance and i recommend this to you if you love puzzles and action.

also the game adds gel, a blue gel (extra bouncy), a orange gel (extra fast) and a white gel (able to put a portal on surfaces where you could not before). i forgot if this was a gel but there is a clear gel (might just be water XD) that removes the gels from the surface it was on so you can change what gel you had on before.  blue gel is really fun.

One of my personal favourite games would recommend. I have beaten the game 4 times and plan to beat it 5.

Not only is the main storyline fun and interesting for both single player and co-op, but I highly recommend taking some extra time to play the community levels. This game is one of the better ones i've played in a while. The puzzles are challenging but not so much as to make you quit. The story, while being minimalistic, is very intersting and funny.  The first time I launched the game and played through the intro/tutorial I nearly died laughing. I highly recomend this game to everyone. Even when you finish the "story" there are tons of community made maps for you to beat. Its tons of fun making your own aswell. You should definitly play with a friend tho, it increases the experience 10 fold. As long as your friend is, well you know.... competent  :)
